$AAPL Well we tagged 3T today. Closed below but expecting higher. It is possible to consider last Friday's low as a wave 4, so any move below that level and the rally is in jeopardy. If this count is correct, wave (4), when it happens,  should be quick and steep to offset the wave (2) correction which was shallow in price in long (several days) in time.

$AAPL Last year in January people were buying the “top“ around $145. Today, it’s $182. If you bought a share every day, you‘d have closed 2021 with ~9k gains. If you bought the equivalent number of shares around the $120 lows, you’d be at ~15k gains. Just buy. It’s that simple. Doubly so for options-only degenerates and bears who insist on going against the current. 😂
